name: Firefox 4 About:Config Dark
description:
Darkens the About:Config page in shades of grey.
Tested in Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b8pre) Gecko/20101119 Firefox/4.0b8pre ID:20101119042412

11.20.10 - Fixed #filterRow label so it doesn't apply font color to context menu
11.1.10 - Changed colors, added scrollbar styling (thanks user 169)
